thread.title: Arundhati Nag turns down SRK!
thread.title_full: Arundhati Nag turns down SRK! - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Arundhati Nag turns down SRK!
text:
We all would love to see Arundhati Nag on the big screen. But sadly, the actress isn't taking up any movie projects for now. She has been neck deep in work with Rangashankara's theatre festival, set to start on October 30.
In fact, she also quelled the rumours doing the rounds that she would be sharing screen space with Ananth Nag after 30 years for Shivarajakumar's newly-launched film Srikanta. We decided to ask the actor herself if that is true and it turns out that the rumour was just that â€” a rumour. Too bad; seeing the two talented actors on screen after three decades would have been a real kick.
